medalWeaponSword.name: Regent
medalWeaponSword.description: Eliminate multiple opponents with a sword.

medalWeaponSniper.name: Sniper Medal
medalWeaponSniper.description: Eliminate multiple opponents with a sniper rifle.

medalWeaponSmg.name: Sub Machinist
medalWeaponSmg.description: Eliminate multiple opponents with a submachine gun.

medalWeaponSidearm.name: One For Each Of You
medalWeaponSidearm.description: Eliminate multiple opponents with a sidearm.

medalWeaponShotgun.name: Close Encounters
medalWeaponShotgun.description: Eliminate multiple opponents with a shotgun.

medalWeaponScout.name: Field Scout
medalWeaponScout.description: Eliminate multiple opponents with a scout rifle.

medalWeaponRocket.name: Splash Damage
medalWeaponRocket.description: Eliminate multiple opponents with a Rocket Launcher.

medalWeaponPulse.name: Lethal Cadence
medalWeaponPulse.description: Eliminate multiple opponents with a pulse rifle.

medalWeaponHandCannon.name: Hawkeye
medalWeaponHandCannon.description: Eliminate an opponent with only precision hits.

medalWeaponGrenade.name: Direct Hit
medalWeaponGrenade.description: Eliminate an opponent with a direct hit from a Grenade Launcher.

medalWeaponFusion.name: Cold Fusion
medalWeaponFusion.description: Eliminate multiple opponents with a fusion rifle.

medalWeaponAuto.name: Assault Specialist
medalWeaponAuto.description: Eliminate multiple opponents with an auto rifle.

medalSurvivalWinLastStand.name: Last Stand Survivor
medalSurvivalWinLastStand.description: Win a round of survival with a last stand.

medalSurvivalUndefeated.name: Survivor
medalSurvivalUndefeated.description: Survive a round of survival without dying.

medalSurvivalTeamUndefeated.name: Survival Team Undefeated
medalSurvivalTeamUndefeated.description: Win a match of survival without losing a round.

medalSurvivalQuickWipe.name: Survival Quick Wipe
medalSurvivalQuickWipe.description: Wipe an enemy team in round of survival quickly.

medalSurvivalKnockout.name: Undertaker
medalSurvivalKnockout.description: Eliminate an entire enemy team when lives are at 0 in survival.

medalSurvivalComeback.name: Survival Comeback
medalSurvivalComeback.description: Win a round of survival after being the first team to hit zero lives.

medalSupremacyRecoverStreak.name: Recovery Streak
medalSupremacyRecoverStreak.description: Recove multiple crests in supremacy in a row without dying.

medalSupremacyPerfectSecureRate.name: Perfect Secure Rate
medalSupremacyPerfectSecureRate.description: Secure every crest from every opponent you eliminate.

medalSupremacyNeverCollected.name: My Crest Is My Own
medalSupremacyNeverCollected.description: Secure your own crest after being eliminated.

medalSupremacyFirstCrest.name: First Crest Secured
medalSupremacyFirstCrest.description: Secure the first crest in Supremacy.

medalSupremacyCrestCreditStreak.name: Crestfallen
medalSupremacyCrestCreditStreak.description: Eliminate multiple opponents and claim their crests.

medalStreakTeam.name: Wrecking Crew
medalStreakTeam.description: Your team has collectively earned a killing streak without dying.

medalPayback.name: Best Served Cold
medalPayback.description: Eliminate the player that eliminated you.

medalMultiEntireTeam.name: Annihilation
medalMultiEntireTeam.description: Eliminate an entire team at once.

medalMulti4x.name: Lights Out
medalMulti4x.description: Rapidly eliminate four players in a row.

medalMulti3x.name: Triple Play
medalMulti3x.description: Rapidly eliminate three players in a row.

medalMulti2x.name: Double Play
medalMulti2x.description: Rapidly eliminate two players in a row.

medalMatchUndefeated.name: Undefeated
medalMatchUndefeated.description: Survive an entire match without dying with at least 12 eliminations.

medalMatchOvertime.name: Time and Half
medalMatchOvertime.description: Have a match go into overtime.

medalMatchNeverTrailed.name: Never In Doubt
medalMatchNeverTrailed.description: Win a match without ever falling behind in round advantage.

medalMatchMostDamage.name: Fight Me!
medalMatchMostDamage.description: Achieve the most damage in an entire match.

medalMatchComeback.name: Comeback
medalMatchComeback.description: Win a match after being down multiple rounds or in points.

medalMatchBlowout.name: Crushed Them
medalMatchBlowout.description: Win a match by multiple rounds or a large lead.

medalDefeatWarlockSigil.name: Rift Breaker
medalDefeatWarlockSigil.description: Defeated a warlock during or shortly after using rift.

medalDefeatTitanBrace.name: Barricade Breaker
medalDefeatTitanBrace.description: Defeated a Titan and their barricade.

medalDefeatHunterDodge.name: Dodge This
medalDefeatHunterDodge.description: Defeat a hunter during or shortly after using dodge.

medalCycle.name: The Cycle
medalCycle.description: Successfully finish a round with at least 1 primary, special, heavy, grenade, melee and super kill.

medalCountdownRoundAllAlive.name: Gangs All Here
medalCountdownRoundAllAlive.description: Your entire team survived a round.

medalCountdownPerfect.name: Countdown Perfect
medalCountdownPerfect.description: Win an entire match of Countdown without losing a round.

medalCountdownDetonated.name: Detonated
medalCountdownDetonated.description: Have the bomb in countdown detonate.

medalCountdownDefusedLastStand.name: Last Stand
medalCountdownDefusedLastStand.description: Defuse a bomb as the only surviving member of your team.

medalCountdownDefense.name: Countdown Defense
medalCountdownDefense.description: Win a round of countdown on defense.

medalControlPowerPlayWipe.name: Power Overwhelming
medalControlPowerPlayWipe.description: Make a power play in countdown.

medalControlPerimeterKill.name: Control Perimeter Kill
medalControlPerimeterKill.description: Eliminate an opponent in the perimeter of a zone.

medalControlMostAdvantage.name: Flag Bearer
medalControlMostAdvantage.description: Secure the most control zones during a match.

medalControlCaptureAllZones.name: Complete Control
medalControlCaptureAllZones.description: Capture all zones during a match of control.

medalControlAdvantageStreak.name: Dominant Advantage
medalControlAdvantageStreak.description: Get a score streak while holding the majority of zones in control.

medalAvenger.name: Blood for Blood
medalAvenger.description: Eliminate an opponent who recently eliminated a teammate.

medalAbilityVoidwalkerVortex.name: The Void
medalAbilityVoidwalkerVortex.description: Eliminate an opponent with a Warlock void bomb.

medalAbilityVoidwalkerDistance.name: Lance
medalAbilityVoidwalkerDistance.description: Eliminate an enemy at a long distance with a Voidwalker bomb.

medalAbilitySunbreakerMulti.name: Everything Looks Like A Nail
medalAbilitySunbreakerMulti.description: Earn a multi-elimination with the Hammer of Sol.

medalAbilitySunbreakerLongRange.name: Pitch Perfect
medalAbilitySunbreakerLongRange.description: Eliminate an enemy player from a long distance using Hammer of Sol.

medalAbilityStormcallerLandfall.name: Landfall
medalAbilityStormcallerLandfall.description: Eliminate an enemy from the initial shockwave of casting StormTrance.

medalAbilitySentinelCombo.name: Sentinel Shield Multikill
medalAbilitySentinelCombo.description: Eliminate multiple opponents with a Sentinel shield.

medalAbilityNightstalkerTetherQuick.name: Entangled
medalAbilityNightstalkerTetherQuick.description: Entangle an opponent in a Nightstalker Shadowshot.

medalAbilityNightstalkerLongRange.name: Longshot
medalAbilityNightstalkerLongRange.description: Hit an opponent with Shadowshot from a long distance.

medalAbilityJuggernautSlam.name: Juggernaut Slam
medalAbilityJuggernautSlam.description: Eliminate an opponent with Fists of Havoc.

medalAbilityJuggernautCombo.name: Absolute Force
medalAbilityJuggernautCombo.description: Eliminate multiple opponents with Fists of Havoc.

medalAbilityGunslingerQuick.name: Lethal Instinct
medalAbilityGunslingerQuick.description: Quickly eliminate an opponent after casting Golden Gun.

medalAbilityGunslingerMulti.name: Handful of Bullets
medalAbilityGunslingerMulti.description: Eliminate multiple opponents with Golden Gun.

medalAbilityFlowwalkerQuick.name: Lightning Strike
medalAbilityFlowwalkerQuick.description: Eliminate an opponent immediately after casting Arc Staff.

medalAbilityFlowwalkerMulti.name: Hurricane
medalAbilityFlowwalkerMulti.description: Eliminate multiple enemies using Arc Staff.

medalAbilityDawnbladeSlam.name: Dawnblade Slam
medalAbilityDawnbladeSlam.description: Eliminate an opponent with a dawnblade slam.

medalAbilityDawnbladeAerial.name: Defying Gravity
medalAbilityDawnbladeAerial.description: Eliminate multiple opponents with Daybreak while airborne.
